title: As Ford loses billions on EVs, the company embraces hybrids
description: Ford's hybrid hype runs counter to recent messaging from the Detroit automakers, which have touted the performance and popularity of all-electric favorites.

title: Google, Microsoft, and Meta can't stop talking about A.I. — here's why Apple rarely mentions it
description: Apple's AI works in the background. And the company doesn't yell about it the way some of the other companies do. It doesn't need to.

title: Meta is rebooting Horizon Worlds as the VR platform struggles to grow
description: Meta vice president of metaverse Vishal Shah explains plans to revamp Horizon Worlds.

title: Microsoft warns of service disruptions if it can’t get enough A.I. chips for its data centers
description: Microsoft has been hungry for thousands of graphics processing units to ramp up capacity for artificial intelligence. Not having enough could spell trouble.

title: The best way to show off your emerging A.I. skills to land a job: You don’t need ‘years of experience' yet
description: Generative artificial intelligence jobs are hot, but it can be tricky figuring out how to display your expertise in a skill that changes by the day.

title: The Dow missed its 14th straight gain — A coin flip could have done that
description: Don’t read too much into the 30-stock average’s recent hot streak. The likelihood of such an event is about the same as flipping a coin.

title: Google's building A.I. into robots to teach them to throw out the trash
description: The Robotics Transformer 2 (RT-2) is a vision-language-action model trained on information on the web that can be translated into actions for the robot.

title: You have a month left to get your share of Facebook's $725 million settlement — here's how
description: Meta users have less than one month left to apply for their share of a $725 million settlement over Facebook privacy violations.

title: India woos U.S. chip giants as it looks to become a semiconductor superpower
description: The CEOs of Micron and Cadence and execs at Applied Materials and AMD were present at a semiconductor event in India alongside Prime Minister Narendra Modi.

title: A marathon, not sprint: Mercedes-Benz CEO outlines challenges in shift to EVs
description: Mercedes-Benz CEO said the company's EVs — which include the EQA and EQE SUV — had received a "good reception" so far.

title: The Bank of Japan just shocked markets with a policy tweak — here's why it matters
description: The Bank of Japan loosened its yield curve control in an unexpected move with ramifications across global financial markets.

title: AstraZeneca CFO denies geopolitics impacts the company's China business after spinoff rumors
description: Aradhana Sarin told CNBC the company was in a "very unique space" regarding impact from rising geopolitical tensions between China and the west.

title: Vietnam's EV maker VinFast set to break ground on delayed U.S. factory
description: VinFast said the 1,800-acre facility is designed to produce up to 150,000 vehicles a year in phase 1. The factory is expected to start operations in 2025.

title: China's housing ministry is getting 'bolder' about real estate support
description: The news indicates how different government levels are starting to act just days after Beijing signaled a shift away from its real estate crackdown.

title: Bank of Japan pledges to guide yield curve control with 'greater flexibility'
description: The BOJ also kept its ultra-loose interest rate intact and revised core consumer inflation forecast upward for the current fiscal year.

title: Yen rises amid reports the Bank of Japan may discuss 'tweaking' policy
description: The Japanese yen rose on Friday morning in Asia, on the back of a report that the Bank of Japan could potentially "discuss tweaking" its yield curve control policy today.

title: What Qin Gang's disappearance means for U.S.-China relations
description: Qin Gang held the position of China's foreign minister for about six months before disappearing from public view in late June — with little explanation.

title: Trump hit with new charges in classified documents case, third defendant added
description: Carlos Deoliveira joins former President Donald Trump and valet Walt Nauta as defendants in the case involving classified documents at Mar-a-Lago in Florida.

title: CNBC Daily Open: The Dow lost steam but the U.S. economy didn’t
description: It was exciting while it lasted, but the Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 0.67%, snapping its historic 13-day winning streak.
